manifest.author: Sam Greenhalgh
manifest.name: Diagrams
manifest.description: Draw.io diagrams for Obsidian. This plugin introduces diagrams that can be included within notes or as stand-alone files. Diagrams are created as SVG files (although .drawio extensions are also supported).

manifest.name: Game Search

manifest.description: This plugin is emoji titler to easily insert an emoji in the title using a keyboard shortcut.

manifest.description: Remove unused block ids in your vault.

manifest.author: twibiral

manifest.author: Shawn McGee
manifest.name: Fill in the Blank (FITB)
manifest.description: Use --magic-- to render inline text as blank line(s) instead.

manifest.author: Venkatraman Dhamodaran
manifest.name: Snippets Manager
manifest.description: A versatile text expansion plugin with full mobile support. Easily manage code snippets, personal info like passport numbers, email signatures, and more. Includes seamless Alfred integration and the ability to sync Awesome ChatGPT prompts as snippets.

manifest.author: ichichikin

manifest.description: Interactivity allows you to run shell commands and scripts directly within your notes, providing their output right alongside your written content, making your note-taking process more dynamic and interactive.

manifest.description: Vault dashboard and navigator. Show recent files by type, files per day, week, month, search files by name, date, tags and more.

manifest.description: Teleprompter window for live presentations and video production.
